Welcome

I'm Marc Woolliscroft

This is a space for me to organize my projects from the past and present as well as share ideas for the future. The site itself is a project, as it is built on my HTML/CSS framework. By design, the portfolio of work is all over the place. I include academic research and side-projects. At times, it's a stream of consciousness. Thanks for stopping by.
